item.description:
Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at MFA First Fridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and delicious tapas available for purchase. Relax and unwind in a beautiful setting with friends both old and new.   For more information: http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/m... The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm 
MFA First Fridays Musical Lineup: March 2—Andy Baer Jazz Ensemble

 

Admission: Regular cost to go to the museum.$22. If you're a member its free.. if you're a student of a local university.. you might be free.. if you are an employee of a big sponsor.. you're probably free. T acess:: Take the Green Line "E" train to the "Museum of Fine Arts" stop, or the Orange Line train to the "Ruggles" stop.   PAID PARKING IS AVAILABLE IN THE HUNTINGTON LOT, THE FENWAY LOT, AND THE MUSEUM ROAD GARAGE ON MUSEUM ROAD. THE PARKING LOTS OFFER CLOSE AND CONVENIENT PARKING TO THE MUSEUM ENTRANCES ON THE FENWAY AND HUNTINGTON AVENUE. THERE IS ALSO LIMITED STREET PARKING SURROUNDING THE MUSEUM. TAKE ADVANTAGE OF PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION DURING WEEKENDS, SCHOOL VACATION WEEKS (APR 19–22), ART IN BLOOM (APR 30–MAY 2), AND OTHER BUSY TIMES. VALET PARKING: CREDIT CARD HOLDERS MAY PARTICIPATE IN VALET PARKING AT THE HUNTINGTON ENTRANCE DURING MUSEUM HOURS. VISIT ALL DAY FOR A FLAT FEE! MEMBERS $17, NONMEMBERS $27.Drinks are reasonably priced.. food is so so.. but all and all.. its a good time to wander the museum and see some of the art after hours while getting a little liquored up on the 2nd floor gallery.


We will meet at 6pm in the lobby near the gift shop of the Huntington Ave entrance.  We will wait there until 6:30, have a quick meet and greet, check in our coats, if you haven't done so already... and away we go!

If you have questions.. feel free to text or call me at 617-372-6555.After the event, 9:30pm, we will meet in the lobby again and head to a bar and have a few drinks and some food if you are still hungry!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6pm in the lobby near the gift shop of the Huntington Ave entrance. We will wait there until 6:30, have a meet and greet, check in our coats ,if you haven't done so already... and away we go!
item.name: MFA First Friday Singles Night
